text: Apuni khan laga cholawta pora ki koi ase etu mani kene thakibi, kelemane taikhan apnikhan laga atma nimite sikhai ase, kele koile etu sob laga hisab to taikhan nijor pora he dibole ase. Cholawta khan laga kotha manibi, tinehoile he taikhan khushi pora kaam koribo, taikhan ke biya napabi, kelemane apuni eneka korile apuni laga eku labh nohobo13.17 1 The. 5:12-13; Rev. 20:28..
